parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if the conduction of the last camCommit call already finished.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''camCommitted''' camera

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera"

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] -  
true if the last camCommit already finished, false if not
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> SQS:
<code>; create a camera object
_cam <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> "camera" [[camCreate]] [5600,4800,10]
_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]]
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "BACK"]
_cam [[camCommit]] 0

<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>;</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> smoothly move the camera to its new position in 6 seconds
_cam [[camSetPos]] [5680,4720,20]
_cam [[camCommit]] 6
@[[camCommitted]] _cam

<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>;</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> proceed</code>
		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> SQF: <code>_cam = "camera" [[camCreate]] [0, 0, 0];
_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]];
_cam [[camSetRelPos]] [0, -5, 10];
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "back"];
_cam [[camCommit]] 0;

[[waitUntil]] {[[camCommitted]] _cam};

_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]];
_cam [[camSetRelPos]] [90, 25, 10];
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "back"];
_cam [[camCommit]] 5;

[[waitUntil]] {[[camCommitted]] _cam};

_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]];
_cam [[camSetRelPos]] [-90, -5, 10];
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "back"];
_cam [[camCommit]] 5;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camCommit]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|CAMCOMMITTED]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|CAMCOMMITTED]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.46|CAMCOMMITTED]]
